import React, { useState } from 'react' import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom' const UpdateBook = (props) => { const {isbn} = useParams() const {books} = useContext(BookContext) const [title, settitle] = useState("") const [author, setauthor] = useState("") const [year, setyear] = useState("") const [publisher, setpublisher] = useState("") console.log (isbn) return (

{books[0].name}

setLocation(e.target.title)} id="title" className="form-control" type="text" />
) } export default UpdateBook
